name: Birthday Cake Maker Game Pro
description:
Hey Kids.. , do you like cookies and cakes ?

Sure you like them, you are a kid who loves chocolate and fruit. And if you like cookies then of course you like and birthday parties where you can eat a very delicious cake. If you want to help a child whose birthday is today you have to help us prepare a big and tasty cake. Through this chocolate cake cooking game you will be able to prove everybody that you are a great friend but also a very good cook that can make the best looking cakes ever !

Cake Maker Kids allows you to create a cake for any occasion. If you want to make a cake for someone’s birthday, then Cake Maker Kids is the app for you.

Features:
beautiful high quality HD graphics
intuitive, easy to use interface
infinite gameplay with unlimited combinations
lots of toppings, candies, fruits, creams, candles, crumbs, marzipan
figures and sound making toys for decoration
screenshots can be saved in your photo gallery to show it to your friends

Let’s download a Cake Maker game now, a greate game It free!

# Ads: -
Please note this game is Free. In this Game No one Place Shown Ads Or No one In-app. so as to not to disturb you during Any path and You Can Enjoy with Game.
